summary: New cute eyes texture for Human female and stand alone.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2][i]
[size=4][center][img]http://i64.tinypic.com/2ntwmlc.jpg[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/DHCpmWV.png[/img][/center]
[center]- Standalone, this mod will add 9+ new eyes to  female human character.
-Mostly Not lore-friendly[/center][center][/center]


[/size][/i][b][size=4]Description[/size][/b][i]
----------------------------------------------------------
I wanted a bit more intense eyes and also some variation.
All of these are hand-drawn.

I will add new eyes if people request colors.


[/i][b][size=4]Installation[/size][/b][i]
----------------------------------------------------------
Unzip the file inside your Skyrim folder. If you want to change the eyes of
your current character, open the console and enter the command
"/showracemenu". This will let you change your eyes :)

[size=5]
[color=#B45F06]KNOW BUGS:[/color][/size]
[color=#d0e0e3]
[color=#c27ba0]- [/color][/color][/i][color=#c27ba0][b]Eyes show up dark or black :[/b][/color][i]Caused by your load order or other mod. I installed this again on a new computer, worked fine. And tried it now with
eight different PCs.
[color=#c27ba0]- CTD :[/color] Your PC can´t handle it, all eyes are 1K. Or use LOOT. It can also conflict with other eye mod, it happens.


[/i][size=4][b]Recommended　MOD[/b][/size][i]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix[/url] by Mr Dave
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50132/?]Eyes Glitch Fix[/url] by bellwood2206
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by tktk

[/i][i]

------------------------------------------------------------------
